title: Media Player updates: enqueue changes, announce added
description: Starting with Home Assistant 2022.6, the media player integration has received two updates to the mediaplayer.playmedia service. The enqueue attribute has been changed to a string in PR #72406 and a new announce boolean attribute was added in PR #72566.

frontMatter.author: Paulus Schoutsen
frontMatter.title: Media Player updates: enqueue changes, announce added
